website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors when it comes to price. There isn't a better value available on today's market.
pros: Shown to improve nasal airflow by more than 30%
The 150-count pack is an unbeatable value
cons: The strong adhesive keeps them in place, but some users note skin irritation after removing the strips

customer_reviews.title: Will rip your skin off! (with constant use)
customer_reviews.text: For starters, they are too thin to really grab enough to pull open the sinus like other strips. also they are too long! also, this style, the tan with padding, holds too tight to your skin. after a week my nose skin was getting shiny and thin. after two weeks i ended up ripping skin OFF my nose. I switched to a different product's clear version, and I've not had the problem again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: As a regular user of Breathe Right strips, I got fed up with the price and decided to try these as an alternative. They are indeed thinner and lighter with less springy action, but they seem to work well enough for me. I frequently had the adhesive fail on the Breathe Right strips so that one of the ends lifted up a bit. I have yet to experience one failure with these, and yet they seem to pull off a little easier. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it with 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My left side nose is usually completely blocked during night, but finally I had successful sleep last night without help of nasty nasal sprays ( and pills : what a waste). I knew they were available, but had ignored them for some reasons. When I saw sweaty Marathon men using nose strips for 41 km long running, I made up my mind to try it. I put two strips side by side for the first time to give the maximum effect, but I found immediately that one piece was just good enough to keep nasal passage open. I like to give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Iwai

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with these and for the price i paid when ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed these strips to help me sleep so I can breathe through my nose and avoid some dry-mouth headaches. I am happy with these and for the price i paid when compared to the brand name version of these. They are very sticky and work as needed, easy to remove with some water, as the product recommends. I would purchase again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: A Cafass

customer_reviews.title: Failed to Keep My Air Passages Open
customer_reviews.text: It's a magnificently manufactured, and packaged, product, but the designers decided to use less material than that of their competitors, openly stating on the envelope that it would help up to 30%. That wasn't enough for me. I have a troublesome deviated-septum, and need the kind of strength provided by my old standbys, Walgreens' large strips, to get the job done. Once again, I was motivated strictly by price -- and I paid for it in the end. I purchased 300, and have already given them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M.

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and wake up in the middle of the night because you can't breathe because either your nose is very dry or your sinuses are acting up, then this product is for you! I've been using these for the past 6 months, and I've had the best sleep of life! I couldn't believe what a difference these things make, but it really does. I can actually breathe normal at night now. They come off pretty easy, but don't pull them off too fast. When applying, I've had to re-position it some times, it re-sticks pretty easily. This is a great product, and for the price, you can't beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Alex

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Need
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! My nostrils collapse when I breathe heavily and this product has been doing a wonderful job at keeping them open for me to breathe. The adhesive is excellent, I can even wear these during sport as well as overnight. That being said, don't put it on and pull it off right away, that hurts. I wouldn't recommend it if you have a very sensitive nose or sensitive skin in general, because it holds on tight and does hurt a bit to get off. Its definitely worth it to me though. It allows me to participate in sports to some extent and overall lets me breath regularly. I'll definitely continue to purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.  Didn't work at all and uses a harsh adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! The spring mechanism is so weak that it doesn't seem to do anything (compared to other brands), and the adhesive is harsh on my skin (and I don't have sensitive skin at all). So, in summary "Doesn't help and trashes my skin, but at least I saved a few bucks?". No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PVM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on- easy to pull off. Not quite as much strength as the extra strength Breath Right Strips but they do open my breathing up for comfortably sleeping. They stay on- have never had one fall off and have used them for almost a year now. I tried them as a cost savings to the Breath Right ones, was wary when they arrived but they did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Baracuda1956

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay adhered, and has very little spring tension. The store brands I've tried have been better, some of them by far. The $ you save will be wasted, and you'll be buying the better ones all the same.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roth

customer_reviews.title: They simply hurt...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the most popular brand of this type of strip and it's a night and day difference. These are good but wildly inconsistent. They sometimes hold to my nose, most times don't. Sometimes they stick, most times don't and they simply hurt. I'd say, go with the Breathe Right Nasal Strips instead. These are not worth the money saved.
customer_reviews.author: R Mauro

customer_reviews.title: While the price was great compared to namebrand options
customer_reviews.text: While the price was great compared to namebrand options, they just were not the same quality. The adhesive was too good in the center and not good enough on the ends. This leads to the ends peeling up over night and getting stuck to the pillow case. But the area over the top of the nose was so sticky that it would remove some skin at times. They were also super hard to get off the paper resulting in accidentally touching the sticky side while trying to remove them resulting in them not sticking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like the brand at one third the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second reorder of this product and it works great for me. It keeps my airways open and I don’t have to spend a fortune. The strips are a little narrower than the brand, but it works just the same. I read some reviews about issues with the adhesive being too strong or too weak, I have not experienced either. I bought the 300 pack this time because that made the value even better. When I get low again I will reorder for a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Works in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: These things are okay in a pinch. The adhesive doesn't work all that great and they usually come off after about 4 or 5 hours. But that's enough to get you to sleep. I just wish they made them in an extra strength as I have a large uncooperative nose. I found that the Walmart house brand works best even better than the name brand. The real draw to these is the price for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: OldProChefTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nose strips are pricey - these are cheap in a 50 pack and work well just have to make sure nose is clean and dry. Not good for more than one use really, which is same as expensive ones. Someone else mentioned cutting them in half and them still working and I actually tried that and it sort of worked but not as reliably - at this price they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: open airway and promote better sleep quality and duration
customer_reviews.text: I have used the name brand version of these in the past (when I had more available income) and can't afford to pay out of pocket for a sleep study. What to do? Buy the off brand and hope they work as well as the original. These do, in fact, work as well as the name brand. They stick, open airway and promote better sleep quality and duration. At about half the price of name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly. I bought these cause they were bigger than store bought "Large". Asked several stores to get their brand in extra large, but no one did. Only used 2 (two) nights so far. Sticky is pretty good. Stayed on well all night. Sticky seems to wash off okay with an alcohol wipe in the morning. Springy product could be stronger, but seemed to work okay. Price is very good. Thx for your product
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: Using these nasal strips (well, any nasal strips that are decent,,,and these are for way less money than breath right strips) along with a cpap machine and you have a very high probability of getting a good night sleep. Be sure to clean the bridge of your nose to keep the strip sticking through out the nite. Happy sheep counting!
customer_reviews.author: man_from_earth

customer_reviews.title: Zero Spring
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the bad reviews, folks. It's like flushing money down the toilet because they're completely useless. There's absolutely zero spring to them. They have about as much resistance as it takes to fold piece of paper in half. Explains why people say they stick so well. Guess what? If you taped a piece of paper to your nose, it'd stick too! It's hard to fall off when they have no spring inside them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: These are made in China.
customer_reviews.text: These are made in China. In pictures there is no indication of this . Nor is there any statement in description that states this. However it is clearly written on the box. Looks like the MADE IN CHINA written on the actual box was photo shopped off the product pictures. I feel deceived since I try to only buy American.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the name brand
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous at first, but these work like a champ. Keeps me from sounding like a saw mill. Will be ordering a 300 pack soon. Only thing I don't like is the adhesive. Its strong enough it doesn't come off in my sleep (which can't be said for other brands) but its also harder to take off. Kinda like taking off a bandaid. My skin is fine, but if you have more sensitive skin, start small and try it out before ordering a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Darmon

customer_reviews.title: Weak plastic, not enough to open my nostrils
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY. I have bought other nose strips in Amazon before. They worked OK. I bought this one, thinking it would be OK too. Nope. The plastic is so small and weak that it fails to open my nostrils. I feel like I'm suffocating. The only thing that works is if I use two of them at the same time, which totally defeats the purpose. I'm never buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Too weak to do the job
customer_reviews.text: The plastic strips are weak. It is sort of like a bandaid crossed with a nasal strip. Even using two of them, one on top of the other, it failed to really open my nostrils as well as Breathe Right. By morning the adhesive had failed and it was popping off.
customer_reviews.author: REL

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the name brand strips only much cheaper! These strips don't pull the skin off my nose as others claim it does on their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: The strips are very good. The larger size is perfect for me and the cost is even better. However, the sticking glue is a little too strong. A person must cautiously remove it in the morning so as not to pull off nose skin. I found, if I stick it on my finger a couple of times b/4 I apply it on my nose at night, they are easier to remove in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Doug

customer_reviews.title: Accomplishes the Main Goal, But Terrible Adhesion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when I was sick in order to bring relief to my poor clogged up nostrils during sleep. They accomplished that job just fine and dandy, but the adhesion is really unfortunate. It's entirely TOO sticky and unnecessarily painful to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Chinon

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dreamy wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought these strips for my wife who has snoared at night for quite some time. The first night she put these on they worked excellent ( did not snoared and slept great ). She said they were better than the name brand ones that she used to use before. I highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Byer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome best strips ever.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, stays on all night as long as you clean you nose before application with rubbing alcohol or something similar. As far as though saying it takes the skin off when removing. just remove it slowly and nothing will happen. Beyond that this are the best at opening your nasal passages. The key is to buy the right size so look at the measurements then measure you nose to pick the right ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Koniar

customer_reviews.title: Want a larger quantity with a reduced price over the brand? A definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: My fault, I didn't read the size and ended up ordering the large size. That being said, I'm very happy with the quality of these strips. My worry concerning the adhesive was unfounded. Stayed on as good as the Breathright brand, the only difference I found was a fantastic price with a larger quantity. Definitely a reorder ( with medium size)!
customer_reviews.author: A. Atta

customer_reviews.title: ... so they don't open the nasal passage way as good as others
customer_reviews.text: They're not the strongest so they don't open the nasal passage way as good as others. But, they're cheap and they do open the nasal passage way somewhat. I'll use these up, but I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: NatashaNJohns

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all night (and helps me breath easily)
customer_reviews.text: I like that these strips stay on my nose all night (another brand always fell off after a few hours). By making it easier to breath, these strips make it easier to fall asleep initially - and to go back to sleep when I wake up in the night. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Robb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, works, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive works well, they are 1/4 of the price of breathe right strips. They work, but they are not as strong as breathe right strips so they don't work as well. Good economy option, but if they added another plastic strip to make them stronger I'd repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Walrus

customer_reviews.title: Work great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: THese actually work really for the price, I normally buy the green extra box of the expensive BRAND and those fit perfect.. These fit a little big tho.. And the adhesive is almost too good to be honest.. Sometimes they are a pain to get off in the morning.. But overall I recommend.. These save you ALOT of money and work well for the price
customer_reviews.author: D-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive caused welts around nose.
customer_reviews.text: The problem I have with the strips is that the glue adhesive has left a RED WELT around my nose exactly to the shape of the strip. The glue is very strong, in fact maybe too strong. I have used breath-rite strip for a long time with no problem (accept cost) and thought I would save a little. The trouble with products coming from China is that they may not match US standards for product safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the original it is very flimsy and thin. Design is good but the plastic center pieces need to be stronger to keep the nostrils open. Good adhesive if cleaning area with soap before is done. Overall an average product but it is a lot cheaper than the original so this is to be expected. I am in hopes that the manufacturer will make it stronger in the future.
customer_reviews.author: HealthBuff

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is too strong
customer_reviews.text: Causes lesions / irritation of the nose skin-- glue too strong. Maybe just me, but I never had the problem with the Walmart Equate brand.
customer_reviews.author: enid lillian

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I had a different type that would not stay on throughout the night, these stay on all day and night if you want , I have problems with my air passage and this type works great, sometimes I leave on during the day as well. Taking a bath or shower will not make it come off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisandro E. Roque

customer_reviews.title: Peels off in the middle of the night despite alcohol prepping the skin. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough adhesive and not enough spring. Will peel off in the middle of the night. I’ve bought many different nasal strips via Amazon. Some are better than others. But this one simply does not work.
customer_reviews.author: S. YU

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband. He is very pleased with it and we have re-ordered it recently. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Helen H

customer_reviews.title: Expansion power is a little weak
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as other namebrand product. It works but makes you realize how effective the other ones really were.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than the brand name nasal strips
customer_reviews.text: Seem similar as the famous brand name version. Compared to the brand name extra large size, these are slightly narrower in the middle, approximately the same width at both ends and about 1/4" longer. They seem to adhere about the same. I think they seem to expand the nostrils about the same amount.
customer_reviews.author: RichardW

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to name brand strips
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance as an alternative to the breathe right strips. He wears them every night to bed and the name brands are pretty pricey so we decided to try this one. They work almost as good and are a way better deal! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Nature

customer_reviews.title: Rips your skin off!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price and it is comfortable to wear, but the glue is too sticky and pulls my skin off after one night. If they could fix the adhesive, this would be a good product. I threw mine away; too painful to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered the medium size. They work for me, forget to take a couple with me on a visit, I won't forget again.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove, adhesive wears off quick even after preparation. Prefer breath right, or CVS brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: The strip is very point and irritates my skin.
customer_reviews.text: These are wide and do stick well. The main problem is the end of the strip is very pointy and sharp. It digs into my skin at night. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original nose strips
customer_reviews.text: After the local dollar store discontinued carrying a very similar product, quickly went to Amazon and discovered these. I love these strips. These nasal strips stay on my nose far better than the higher priced original nose strips. Also like that 50-100 strips can be ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive works well, but the plastic in these ...
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive works well, but the plastic in these strips is very thin; i barely feel any difference in my breathing with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie M

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm having trouble finding cloth ones in stores, so I turned to Amazon. These are good, good stick, good quality. I'll be reordering these. UPDATE: Still buying these but the backing is now missing the slice making it difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michael Barsotti

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive is pretty weak, barely stays on my nose
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is pretty weak, barely stays on my nose, I've even cleaned my nose off before application to make sure the oil is not keeping it from sticking, and they still fall off. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: They stick to the skin well - yes, they ...
customer_reviews.text: They stick to the skin well - yes, they are harder to peel off in the morning than the brand name, if that were improved they would be the ultimate thing.
customer_reviews.author: Redbeer

customer_reviews.title: These are a disgusting waste of $13
customer_reviews.text: These are a disgusting waste of $13.99.......and...they would be a waste of $1.00 !!!. I swear that card stock paper would have far more strength to separate my nostrils if it were stuck to them. The strips in the order of these that I had before were 10 times as effective, and that is what I figured I was getting this time. Unfortunately , I got these quite a while before I started using them so a refund is probably out of the question.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use these for better breathing at night and they stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for so I am not ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for so I am not all that surprised that these were inferior to the Breathe Right Extra strips. These strips don't stay on during the night and eventually I have to remove them in the middle of the night. Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: worst thing ever
customer_reviews.text: These are really long so they extend past the nose. They are also super sticky and will take your skin along off with it. Very painful to remove
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Day

customer_reviews.title: Not That Great
customer_reviews.text: The price was so right but nowhere near as good as Breathe Right. Woke up often with half the strip coming off my nose many times. I've been wearing nasal strips to go to sleep every night for years. Never had that happen before.
customer_reviews.author: kburtond

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Just as effective as the pricier alternatives. Will continue buying these. They fit will, stick all night and come off easily in the morning. I’ve had great sleep with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The item is very sticky and thus stays on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is very sticky and thus stays on the nose, however, it is not as wide as the major brand and did not seem to give as much relief.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Work better than national brands
customer_reviews.text: Given that nothing is ever perfect, I give the product 4 stars. What makes these nasal strips good is that they are thin and more flexible. They adhere well. Others (national brands included) are too stiff and overpower the adhesive. They pull away from the nose. I like to use them twice. Great product at an economical price.
customer_reviews.author: mark vaillancourt

customer_reviews.title: These are just as good as the name brand nasal strips
customer_reviews.text: These are just as good as the name brand nasal strips, maybe better! This was the 1st night I wore them and they remained intact till I peeled it off. There was no thick glue residue on my nose as compared to others. These are a great deal at getting 100 for the price of 30.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Work as well as store brands for less $
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for months & they help me breathe at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G.

customer_reviews.title: Not stiff enough
customer_reviews.text: The price us right but the bands do not seem stiff enough to lift the nostrils apart. They may be more suitable for children
customer_reviews.author: Bill_

customer_reviews.title: Too thin to open nostrils one bit
customer_reviews.text: CVS brand and Breath Right have worked great for me know the price was too good to be true unfortunately did not make a difference literally as if I just placed the strip on nostrils for decoration %-C May work enough for someone with very thin delicate nostrils but did not make a difference in mine one bit but they accept returns
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as name brand, don't stick well and sizing is awkward. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Charliegd

customer_reviews.title: breathe strips
customer_reviews.text: They work just as good as the name brand ones at much less cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as the expensive Breath Rite competitor
customer_reviews.text: As good as the expensive Breath Rite competitor.... I have struggled most of my life with a deviated septum which made it tough to breath/sleep at night.... THIS works for me and heartily endorse. and thank you for being so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: rakooi

customer_reviews.title: A bit too long
customer_reviews.text: Sticks well. Longer than other brands like breathright. Ok overall, but probably won't buy again because of the length vs my medium sized nose.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Parent

customer_reviews.title: not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: These strips stick well, are not too hard to remove, and if you have a relatively delicate nose, they probably work fine. But they are very thin and don't provide the tension necessary to achieve full patency for those of us with a more substantial proboscis.
customer_reviews.author: JFSHAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Stick really well and come off without pulling skin off. I love these for sleeping and running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn't stick to strip
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for a few years to help me breath when I sleep. They have been great, except for the most recent batch I received. The strip no longer sticks to the adhesive throughout the night, so I will wake up with the adhesive strip on my nose and the nose strip missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and weak.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cheaper alternative to Breathright or Equate products. This product is very flimsy and weak, and unfortunately did not open up my nose like the before mentioned products. One can tell the difference immediately as the plastic inserts are thinner hence less strength/tension to properly spring back and force open the nasal passages. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Like other reviews mention
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Like other reviews mention, these aren't as springy as the name brand. But they still work throughout the night and the adhesive is very strong. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MWine

customer_reviews.title: Nice price but didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as name brand. Came loose during the night even with proper cleaning of nose and pressing in place 2-3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Seiple

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick.
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews stating the stuck real well is the only reason that I bought them, must have been put there by the seller because even after prepping with rubbing alcohol, they will not stuck. Also they are too long.
customer_reviews.author: owen holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and very good quality especially compared to store brands I’ve bought. The adhesive hold for a long time and it opens up the airways nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble. Breathe easy strips are better
customer_reviews.text: These aren't very good. Really thin and flimsy. They didn't work on me at all. I had to just spend the money and get breathe easy instead. They are more expensive but honestly they work so much better. I'm gonna have to toss the ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Better Breath Nasel Strips (A very good savings)
customer_reviews.text: While I think the product is very good and the sticking quality is only slightly less than "Breath Right", I do feel that the label and packaging is deceptively perfect to "Breath Right" packaging. Until I received it, I thought I was getting "Breath Right". But, the savings more than made up for this. I am very pleased with the "Better Breath" product. Tom S.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive breathing assist that does what it promises.
customer_reviews.text: I apply a strip at bedtime and thus do not snore. An easy solution to an annoying problem.😃
customer_reviews.author: J. Richard Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great product and priced right
customer_reviews.text: I use these strips very often. They improve my breathing and comfort level for sound sleeping. Great product and priced right!
customer_reviews.author: Jon T. Currier

customer_reviews.title: By far the best I've found
customer_reviews.text: These nasal strips work great. They don't loosen during the night like many others do and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Humble Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Work just like the name brand for a LOT less money. What more is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: kkh

customer_reviews.title: effective breath strips
customer_reviews.text: They work well but some are stuck to the paper wrapper and hard to use. For the price they are a good buy. Get the large size for large nose.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wayne S. Mergott Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful during removal!
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive worked really well. So well it tore off all the skin on my nose. Was helping me breath easy at night and was planning on using the strips nightly. Unfortunately I won’t be glueing anything to my skinless nose for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. Way to sticky and do not open nasal passages enough. It says right on the box only opens 30%. too thin also made in China as if you need one more reason
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Jozwiak

customer_reviews.title: Needed two
customer_reviews.text: Had to use one on top of another, but got good sleep after that.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: These are very good and help me breathe at night
customer_reviews.text: These are very good and help me breathe at night. At least as good as Breathe Right Strips and so, so much more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Winn O. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Almost too strong. Not as much spring strength as the branded strips, but much better value.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: My son uses them and says they help with his congested nose.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Mely

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky. Does the job. Some are lacking tackiness, others will RIP your skin off. Price is right nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: marie hofer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hold!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. They hold so well, I sometimes have a hard time peeling them off. I wash the sides of my nose, but not the top, as I did peel a bit of skin off once. Also, if you only have a mild issue, you can cut them across the middle and make 2 out of each of them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other.
customer_reviews.text: This product is thee most superior product of its kind that I have found so far anywhere. The "opening force" excellent and the quality o lf the sticking power is also excellent. Removal is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harms

customer_reviews.title: On My Second Batch of 300 Strips
customer_reviews.text: Having gone through my first order, I've ordered a second round of 300 Strips; they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: David Bower

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me.
customer_reviews.text: Price is right. Use almost every night. Can leave nose a little red. Rather a red nose than no sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little stiffer
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were stronger than they are. They do the job, just could do better if the were stiffer than they are.
customer_reviews.author: ranger831

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I can breath so much better while trying to fall asleep. These strips are easy to apply and help me get to sleep much quicker. Struggling to breath at night was really disrupting my ability to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Little bigger than big.
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger than another brands 'large' and almost attach to my cheeks. The adhesive is very aggressive and doesn’t want to ‘release’ the next morning. Otherwise, they do keep your nasal passages open so you can breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: great substitute
customer_reviews.text: Used to buy the more expensive breathe right strips but these work just as well and the effects seem to last longer...as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Teaching Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great - every bit as good as the comparable name brand strips.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to Breathe Right Strips.
customer_reviews.text: Breathe Right Strips adhered 12 plus hours. These would not adhere 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Larry James

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: These are basically just bandaids. There is no spring action that pulls your nostrils open. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: MQFORU 300ct Large Better Breathe Nasal Strips to Reduce Snoring, Drug-Free, Works Instantly to Improve Sleep, Relieve Nasal Congestion Due to Colds & Allergies, (66mm*19mm)
feature_bullets: Main material: surface material ( breathable transparent porous PE or non-woven materials), pressure-sensitive adhesives, elastic material (polyester) and back sticker.
INSTANT RELIEF - Strong enough to open the nasal passage, these nasal strips help relieve nasal congestion due to colds & allergies
IMPROVE SLEEP - Drug-Free nasal strips can help you reduce nasal snoring, so that you can breathe better and sleep better at night. Safe to use with any medicine
COMFORTABLE - Specially designed for those with sensitive skin. Don't cause any irritation. No side effects
GREAT VALUE - Affordable enough for your daily use and do an adequate job at helping you breathe

EASY TO APPLY AND REMOVE - Wash and dry your nose well before applying; press and hold down the strip until it is secure on your nose; wash your face with warm water and start to loosen the strip from each end gently.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
